A Website

by junyichong

Hi! I am Jun Yi.

Call me Jun Yi, or Chong, or Jun if you like.
I graduated from Tokyo Tech with a mechanical engineering degree,
and now working in Malaysia with a huge debt to the Malaysian government.
At least it is interest free...

Check out my resume if you are interested.

Note to self

Seek discomfort

No one is above learning a new lesson

Be Confident, Stay Grounded

It's never too late to start

Don't sweat the unchangeable

Do important things

About this website

Originally built with Django and deployed to Heroku.
Now modified with Chulapa Jekyll theme and hosted on GitHub Pages.
15 usd/year domain name from Namecheap.

Made possible by tutorials on YouTube. Published during the Covid-19 pandemic.
Thanks for visiting.
